participant_1.background:
I enjoy a good cup of tea while I practice my archery.
my favorite food is sushi.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
i recently moved to sweden.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
i enjoy reading history books.
i wear a lot of purple.
My worst nightmare is drugs and alcohol harming my family and I am a peaceful person who would never hurt anyone.

content.text: Not bad! I just moved to sweden and am looking for new friends.
Oh fun! I love sweden! I enjoy taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
That is a great idea! I would love to go to a bookstore. Are you a bookworm?
Yes, I love reading! I recently bought a video game console so I can play with my son.
That is really nice of you to do that for your son!
I have a lot of fun playing games with him, it is a great way to bond.
I bet it is! I love spending time with my kids too.
That's great! What are your kids into?
They love to play outside and go to the park.
That's so cute! I love kids that love to play.
Me too! They are always so happy and energetic.
I know what you mean! They are a joy to be around.
